headline.print_headline: NCAA Asks for Dismissal of 2 Scholarship Lawsuits
headline.main: NCAA Asks for Dismissal of 2 Scholarship Lawsuits

docs.snippet: The NCAA and 11 conferences that have played major college football in recent years have filed a motion to dismiss two antitrust lawsuits that accuse the association of illegally capping compensation to athletes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The NCAA and 11 conferences that have played major college football in recent years have filed a motion to dismiss two antitrust lawsuits that accuse the association of illegally capping compensation to athletes.

headline.print_headline: Apple to Add Security Alerts for iCloud Users, Says Cook: WSJ
headline.main: Apple to Add Security Alerts for iCloud Users, Says Cook: WSJ

docs.snippet: Apple Inc is planning additional steps to keep hackers out of user accounts in the face of the recent celebrity photo scandal, but denied that lack of security allowed intruders to post nude photographs of celebrities on the Internet, the Wall Str...
docs.lead_paragraph: Apple Inc is planning additional steps to keep hackers out of user accounts in the face of the recent celebrity photo scandal, but denied that lack of security allowed intruders to post nude photographs of celebrities on the Internet, the Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.print_headline: Brown Slammed Over Tesla in California Debate
headline.main: Brown Slammed Over Tesla in California Debate

docs.snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown's long-shot Republican challenger blasted him for failing to do enough to land a Tesla battery plant Thursday during the only scheduled debate of this year's governor's race, a testy, hourlong exchange that also featured clashes o...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown's long-shot Republican challenger blasted him for failing to do enough to land a Tesla battery plant Thursday during the only scheduled debate of this year's governor's race, a testy, hourlong exchange that also featured clashes over teacher tenure, the costs of combating climate change and high-speed rail.

headline.main: Two Spirits in the Venezuelan Jungle

docs.snippet: Thought to possess two spirits, the transgender women of Venezuela’s Warao people are seen as being close to the ancestor spirits that roam the jungle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thought to possess two spirits, the transgender women of Venezuela’s Warao people are seen as being close to the ancestor spirits that roam the jungle.

headline.print_headline: Serena Coach Says She Is Only Human
headline.main: Serena Coach Says She Is Only Human

docs.snippet: Even the best players have their ups and downs, and crises of confidence, says tennis coach Patrick Mouratoglou, who believes Serena Williams has now regained her way in pursuit of a third U.S. Open title in a row....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even the best players have their ups and downs, and crises of confidence, says tennis coach Patrick Mouratoglou, who believes Serena Williams has now regained her way in pursuit of a third U.S. Open title in a row.

headline.print_headline: Orioles Beat Reds 9-7 to Complete 3-Game Sweep
headline.main: Orioles Beat Reds 9-7 to Complete 3-Game Sweep

docs.snippet: J.J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles gave away a six-run lead before rebounding to beat the Cincinnati Reds 9-7 Thursday night for a three-game sweep....
docs.lead_paragraph: J.J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles gave away a six-run lead before rebounding to beat the Cincinnati Reds 9-7 Thursday night for a three-game sweep.

headline.main: Teixeira, Headley Lift Yankees Over Red Sox 5-4

headline.print_headline: Euro 2016 Qualifiers Likely to Be a Damp Squib
headline.main: Euro 2016 Qualifiers Likely to Be a Damp Squib

docs.snippet: Two wins in 10 matches could be enough to reach Euro 2016 following UEFA’s decision to expand the final tournament to 24 teams while keeping the same format for the qualifying competition....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two wins in 10 matches could be enough to reach Euro 2016 following UEFA’s decision to expand the final tournament to 24 teams while keeping the same format for the qualifying competition.

headline.print_headline: Florida Officials Seek to Appeal Ruling Against Gay Marriage Ban
headline.main: Florida Officials Seek to Appeal Ruling Against Gay Marriage Ban

docs.snippet: Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi on Thursday filed a notice of an appeal in federal court on Thursday challenging a ruling last month by a U.S. district judge that declared the state's gay marriage ban unconstitutional....
docs.lead_paragraph: Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi on Thursday filed a notice of an appeal in federal court on Thursday challenging a ruling last month by a U.S. district judge that declared the state's gay marriage ban unconstitutional.

headline.print_headline: Rasmus Homers in 10th, Blue Jays Beat Rays 1-0
headline.main: Rasmus Homers in 10th, Blue Jays Beat Rays 1-0

docs.snippet: Pinch-hitter Colby Rasmus homered in the 10th inning and the Toronto Blue Jays earned their first three-game sweep at Tampa Bay by beating the Rays 1-0 on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Colby Rasmus homered in the 10th inning and the Toronto Blue Jays earned their first three-game sweep at Tampa Bay by beating the Rays 1-0 on Thursday night.
